info.title: CLIENTXCMS New Gen API
info.description: This is the API documentation for the CLIENTXCMS New Gen API

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort fields, e.g. sort=id or sort=-id

post.summary: Perform action on customer (suspend, reactivate, ban, disable2FA)

get.description: Returns list of groups with optional filters, sorting and relations

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by field, e.g. sort=name or sort=-name for descending

get.description: Returns a paginated list of pricing entries with optional filtering and sorting.

parameters.name: filter[related_type]
parameters.description: Filter by related type (e.g. product, config_option)

parameters.name: filter[monthly]
parameters.description: Filter by monthly price ou can replace this with any other pricing field

post.description: Creates a new pricing entry for a product or config option

get.description: Returns the pricing identified by id

delete.description: Deletes a pricing from the system

parameters.name: pricing
parameters.description: Add pricing details to the response

PricingRequest.title: Store Pricing Request
PricingRequest.description: Schema for creating or updating a pricing related to a product or service

related_type.description: Type of the related entity (e.g. product, config_option)

Permission.title: Permission
Permission.description: System permission attached to an admin role

is_default.description: Used as the default role when none is assigned

permissions.description: List of permissions attached to this role

CustomItem.title: Custom Item
CustomItem.description: Custom product added to an invoice manually

Gateway.title: Gateway
Gateway.description: A payment gateway available for customer payments

Invoice.title: Invoice
Invoice.description: A billing invoice issued to a customer

InvoiceItem.title: Invoice Item
InvoiceItem.description: A product or service included in an invoice

description.example: Includes 10GB of storage and SSL certificate

data.description: Custom data associated with this item

discount.description: Optional discount structure for the item

Upgrade.title: Upgrade
Upgrade.description: An upgrade operation applied to a service

SupportAttachment.title: Support Attachment
SupportAttachment.description: A file attached to a support ticket message

SupportComment.title: Support Comment
SupportComment.description: Internal comment on a support ticket

SupportDepartment.title: Support Department
SupportDepartment.description: A support department that handles support tickets and groups staff subscribers.

description.example: Handles all technical issues related to services.

staff_subscribers.description: List of admin IDs subscribed to this department

tickets.description: List of tickets belonging to this department

SupportMessage.title: Support Message
SupportMessage.description: Message sent on a support ticket

customer_id.description: The ID of the associated customer

server_id.description: The ID of the associated server

product_id.description: The ID of the associated product (nullable)

invoice_id.description: The ID of the associated invoice for renewal (nullable)

expires_at.description: The expiration date of the service

suspended_at.description: The suspension date of the service

cancelled_at.description: The cancellation date of the service

cancelled_reason.description: The cancellation reason of the service

delivery_errors.description: The delivery errors of the service

delivery_attempts.description: The delivery attempts of the service

trial_ends_at.description: The trial end date of the service

max_renewals.description: The maximum renewals of the service

suspend_reason.description: The suspension reason of the service

ServiceRenewals.title: Service Renewals
ServiceRenewals.description: Information about a service renewal cycle

slug.description: The URL-friendly slug for the item

status.description: The status of the item (e.g., active, inactive)

description.description: A description or details about the item
description.example: This is a sample item description.

sort_order.description: The order in which the item should be sorted

group_id.description: The id of the group to which the item belongs

pinned.description: Whether the item is pinned or not

image.description: The URL or path to the item's image

parent_id.description: The id of the parent group

related_id.description: The ID of the associated item

related_type.description: The type of the associated item (e.g., product, service, etc.)

status.description: The status of the item (e.g., Active, Hidden, Unreferenced)

description.description: A description or details about the item
description.example: This is a sample item description.

sort_order.description: The order in which the item should be sorted

group_id.description: The ID of the group to which the item belongs

stock.description: The stock quantity of the item

pinned.description: Whether the item is pinned or not
